name: lace.js
description: Tie up your calls like you tie up your shoes

scripts.build: npm run --silent build-es ; npm run --silent build-cjs ; npm run --silent build-umd
scripts.build-es: rm -f -r dist/es && mkdir -p dist/es && tsc -p tsconfig.json
scripts.build-cjs: rm -f -r dist/cjs && mkdir -p dist/cjs && rollup -c -f cjs -o dist/cjs/index.js
scripts.build-umd: rm -f -r dist/umd && mkdir -p dist/umd && rollup -c -f umd -n lace -o dist/umd/index.js
